overview.summary: Make a graph or table of a variable over time.

description.p: This module allows you to output a graph or table of values for a particular variable, in a particular grid location over time. You must know the three-dimensional [x,y,z] index of the variable and if the data is multi-level, you must know which level the data is on. These values must be inserted in the upper right. By selecting either "Node Centered" or "Cell Centered" a list of variables should appear, click on "Material" to select a material, then choose "Graph", "Table", or "Export"
This same functionality is available in the GridVisualizer, but here the visualization overhead is removed.
